title: [GAMEPLAY] Kalista can't bind a second time

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
So I was playing a normal with a Kalista + Braum in the Botlane. Kalista had Braum soulbound (I think that's what it's called, right?), everything was fine. Then for some reason Braum disconnected, never to be seen again. At this point Kalista tried to soulbind me (Volibear). There was the typical soundeffect, yet nothing else happened. Both of us didn't know what to do. Then she tried the same with Irelia, same results.

Link leads to my matchhistory version of the game, IDK if that helps.
Others than that, have a nice one. 
Peace.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: You have to do the rebind within the first 3 minutes.

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=nbbpQEUN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-07T00:10:51.001+0000)
>
> You have to do the rebind within the first 3 minutes.

Correct - there's a limited about of time before you can no longer rebind to another champion.

If you are the one who get binded, are you able to remove it too? I tried both (rebind as Kalista and remove as the one who gets binded), but it didn´t work somehow. It´s stupid if you get binded to Kalista, but don´t want it. Yet it would also be stupid if no one wants to get binded (from Kalista´s view).

> [{quoted}](name=MrFluffyPuffy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=nbbpQEUN,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-09-07T17:35:10.254+0000)
>
> If you are the one who get binded, are you able to remove it too? I tried both (rebind as Kalista and remove as the one who gets binded), but it didn´t work somehow. It´s stupid if you get binded to Kalista, but don´t want it. Yet it would also be stupid if no one wants to get binded (from Kalista´s view).

If you're binded, you're not able to remove the binding. Kalista controls who she binds.
So you're screwed if you get an afk...

basically i thought this was a BS thing myself.  i dont understand why they dont let you rebind.  even at this point where she isnt top tier anymore.  just give her a slight addition would be cool of Riot
I didn't know you could bind again even if your previous ally DC's. Maybe that's the bug?
